featured.text: Red imported fire ants build mounds in any type of soil.
The first vodka made from wheat was imported from France.
Trade is driven by different production costs in different countries, making 26 cheaper for some countries to import goods rather than make them.

other.text: By 1975 the red imported fire ant had colonized over 52 million hectares of the United States.
It was a lifesaver for Swiss knife makers, who were struggling to compete with cheaper German imports.
Red imported fire ants can cause a number of problems.

definition.zh_def: 進口，將商品或服務從其他國家帶入本國的行為。
definition.en_def: To bring goods or services into a country from abroad for sale.
definition.example: The company decided to import electronics from Japan.
